meanings.definition: The sabotage of activities harmful to the environment.
meanings.sent1: The ecotage halted the construction of the harmful factory.
meanings.sent2: The activists planned an ecotage to protect the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The ecotage against the polluting company was a green victory.
meanings.sent4: Their ecotage was a powerful statement against environmental destruction.
meanings.sent5: The ecotage left a lasting impact on the community's eco-consciousness.

meanings.definition: An act of sabotage carried out in the name of environmentalism.
meanings.sent1: The group's ecotage aimed to raise awareness about deforestation.
meanings.sent2: The ecotage was a bold move to protest against the oil drilling.
meanings.sent3: The ecotage event was both daring and environmentally friendly.
meanings.sent4: Their ecotage symbolized their dedication to protecting nature.
meanings.sent5: The ecotage was a clear message against environmental harm.
